name: Micro Dungeon (itch)
description:
A Micro Dungeon Crawler, Kindof based on The Binding Of Isaac.

Made for JoshuaMclean's Shape Jam in 72 hours, I would have liked to add more content but what I added seemed to fit withing the time limit. Thanks for playing, hope you enjoyed.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Fire
